wikipedia_page.main: Clive Driskill-Smith (born 1978) is an English organist.

response: In addition to his solo and Silk Road work, as well as his frequent appearances with chamber groups and orchestras, Gramley performs with the British organist Clive Driskill-Smith in the duo Organized Rhythm.  The pair's first recording, Beaming Music, was issued in 2008.

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals
response: * 1995–96 Clive Driskill-Smith (also Assistant Organist at Winchester College; subsequently Organ Scholar at Christ Church, Oxford, then Sub-organist there and now Organist at All Saints’ Episcopal Church, Fort Worth, Texas USA)
